changelog:
* Human readable Ethereum “approve”/”revoke” flow.
* Changed unknown contract address warning screen.
* Remove BNB Beacon Chain support.
* Remove Turkish language support.
* Fix tutorial-related translations.
* Fix horizontal scroll of the title when setting Wipe code.
* Known Solana tokens' don’t need to be confirmed.
* Fix screen title when confirming installation.
* "Enter passphrase on host" dialog is now not shown immediately after accessing Suite.
changelog_bitcoinonly:
* Changed unknown contract address warning screen.
* Remove Turkish language support.
* Fix tutorial-related translations.
* Fix horizontal scroll of the title when setting Wipe code.
* Fix screen title when confirming installation.
* "Enter passphrase on host" dialog is now not shown immediately after accessing Suite.

changelog:
* Solana: rent fee calculation [#4933]
* Solana: loadable token definitions [#3541]
* Replaced "next page" icon with "..." ellipsis when confirming long message.
* Fixed Solana staking dialog title.
* Updated EIP-1559 fee-related labels.
* Allow firmware upgrade even if language change failed.
* Solana: fees calculation is now exact [#4965]
changelog_bitcoinonly:
* Replaced "next page" icon with "..." ellipsis when confirming long message.
* Allow firmware upgrade even if language change failed.

changelog:
* Ability to cancel recovery on word count selection screen.
* New UI for confirming long messages.
* Solana staking confirmation dialogs.
changelog_bitcoinonly:
* Ability to cancel recovery on word count selection screen.
* New UI for confirming long messages.

changelog:
* Show last typed PIN number for short period of time.
* Multisig-related changes.
* Simplify UI of Cardano transactions initiated by Trezor Suite.
* Included new version of bootloader (2.1.8).
* Fix ETH account number detection.
* New EVM call contract flow UI.
* Fix translation of the 'Enable labeling' screen.
changelog_bitcoinonly:
* Show last typed PIN number for short period of time.
* Multisig-related changes.
* Included new version of bootloader (2.1.8).
* Fix translation of the 'Enable labeling' screen.

changelog:
* Removed CoSi functionality. 
* Increased Optiga read timeout to avoid spurious RSODs.
changelog_bitcoinonly:
* Removed CoSi functionality. 
* Increased Optiga read timeout to avoid spurious RSODs.

changelog:
* Introducing repeated backups. 
* Multi-share backups can now have any number of shares. 
* Added support for Cardano Conway certificates [Universal fw only].
changelog_bitcoinonly:
* Introducing repeated backups. 
* Multi-share backups can now have any number of shares.

changelog:
* Add translations capability. 
* Add loader to homescreen when locking the device. 
* Allow for going back to previous word in recovery process. 
* Clear sign ETH staking transactions on Everstake pool. [Universal fw only] 
* Display descriptors for BTC Taproot public keys. 
* Multiple Solana instructions improved. [Universal fw only] 
* Add missing semicolon character to the passphrase entry.
changelog_bitcoinonly:
* Add translations capability. 
* Add loader to homescreen when locking the device. 
* Allow for going back to previous word in recovery process. 
* Display descriptors for BTC Taproot public keys. 
* Add missing semicolon character to the passphrase entry.

changelog:
* Trezor Safe 3 now supports Solana, expanding the range of cryptocurrencies it can securely manage. [Universal fw only] 
* Ethereum fees are now uniformly presented in Gwei, enhancing clarity and consistency for users. [Universal fw only] 
* Issue with missing address confirmation screens is now fixed. [Universal fw only] 
* Resolved an issue related to the invalid encoding of signatures from the Optiga chip.
changelog_bitcoinonly: * Resolved an issue related to the invalid encoding of signatures from the Optiga chip.

changelog:
* QR Code for Extended Public Keys (XPUBs). 
* The new bootloader version 2.1.4 is now included for enhanced system performance and security. 
* The screen will now automatically turn off when the device is locked, helping to extend the life of the OLED display and save energy.
changelog_bitcoinonly:
* QR Code for Extended Public Keys (XPUBs). 
* The new bootloader version 2.1.4 is now included for enhanced system performance and security. 
* The screen will now automatically turn off when the device is locked, helping to extend the life of the OLED display and save energy.
